name: Dungeon Below
description:
Dungeon Below is a tower defense games that aims to give a new look to the tower defense system that everyone is used to!

In the final project we aim to give the player the option to build their own decks, have a Booster Pack system to unlock new cards, and to make upgrades based on fusing cards together!

Controls

Camera Movement: W A S D

Camera Rotation: Z and X

Camera Distance: Q and E

Tower Placement: Card Selection and Tower Placement is made by Left Clicking on the card and then on the desired place.

Pause Game: ESC or P

Lore

In a peaceful World that is known by Argon, ruled by the mankind, the age of wars long gone, the peaceful times seemed like they would last forever, until...

The arrogance of the Kings who ruled all over the most powerful Kingdoms turned agaisn't themselfs, not happy with just rulling the surface, they wanted to go deeper and deeper, untill they reached a place that should've been kept closed forever.

With the paths to the surface opened by the arrogant Kings, the Demon King and the creatures from the dungeon could finally be free and try to rule over the planet! With the beggining of this monstrous invasion a group of Heroes was created and responsible to keep peace in this lands.

Meet our fearsome squad! Meet Sir Knyr the Warrior! Before all this apocalypse Sir Knyr was just a normal warrior responsible to keep the peace in the kingdom of Ashtra, one of the most powerful kingdoms in Argon, since it was such as waste to keep well-trained man like Knyr dealing with the normal people he was rapidly assigned to be the Warrior of the World-Saving Squad! Being a extremly closed range defense, but with powerful swings, Sir Knyr is the member capable of dealing the most damage per attack, with the downside of being Slower and having a smaller range than the others! Meet Erin the Archer! Erin was your normal huntress, she loved to go for walks and interact with the wildlife around her! Besides being a huntress she didn't really like to hunt for fun, she only killed any type of animal if needed.  With the greed of the people rapidly growing, and with the food resources running lower and lower people were getting tired of eating just bread and water, so what we can call an animal slaughter began and people all over the kingdom started hunting more and more, which made Erin extremly mad, since the wildlife was one of the most important things to her. With all of this happening Erin started hunting the people instead of the animals, until the point she gained the title of the "Huntress of Hunters". Besides being hated by a lot of people, its not doubt that she is one of the best Archers in the kingdom which caught the attention of the King when building this Squad! Erin is a medium range defense, but with high attack speed! She is a really good ally to have in the backlines besides not being the one that does more damage, her other stats really make up for it! Meet Zox the Mage! Since he was born he was always a very curious child with the thirst to learn about everything, needless to say that his curiousity ended up being extremlly benefecial to him, learning how to read perfectly at the age of 4, Zox is considered  a prodigy all over the Ashtra, besides being born in a poor family that did not have access to any type of knowledge, Zox used to sneak at the middle of the night into the Kingdom Library. Being extremly close to the earth gave Zox an affinity with the Earth element, which ended up being his magic affinity.  Zox is known for his earth powers and the capacity to do things that people consider impossible, such as flying! Besides being one of the most powerfull humans known on Argon, his lifestyle had its downsides, he is extremly shy and anti-social. Besides that with a lot of talk and convincing the King was able to make Zox join the squad, but whenever its possible he still prefers to use his power to make sure he is high enough so he doesn't have to talk with anyone else. Zox is the most powerfull tower curently in the game, but also the most expensive one, he is an incredible range, AOE damage, and for sure hits hard! Normal:

Meet our enemies!

Besides having a lot of enemies planned for Dungeon Below, currently we only have one enemy which is the fearsome Wolf!

The Wolf With the opening of the dungeon doors, giant animals starting to crawl from the caves! One of them being the fearsome wolf! Besides being a powerful enemy, it still is no match for our heroes, although if they are not careful he can sneak in and do some damage to Ashtra! Wolfs have a moderate speed, and a low life since they are the first and most basic enemy.
